title: Upgrade from PlayStore to latest version as logged in user
custom_preconds:
Given the user have latest RC version from AppTester installed
And the user is logged in

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user upgrade to the latest prod version
And the doesn't have selected favorite team(s)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the upgrade is successful
And there are no crashes
And all the settings are retained
And favorite teams are retained

And version in Settings>About MiLB app is the expected

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user upgrades to the latest prod version from PlayStore 
And the user has selected favorite team(s)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the upgrade is successful
And there are no crashes
And all the settings are retained
And user won't have fav teams after upgrade
And version in Settings>About MiLB app is the expected
